name: Dimensional (itch) (JesusGutierrez)
description:
This is my Final Capstone Project called “ Dimensional “. It’s a 2.5D Metroid Vania Platform Game where you can explore, collect and spend. Made with unity.

Owlet is the reincarnation of the guardian spirit of the moon, this being lives completely alone on the Moon and one day he decides to leave his world to explore the cosmos, unfortunately his ship was swallowed by a multidimensional black hole that launched him into the unknown. , but feeling disoriented, he feels a great fear of not knowing how to refresh his world, so he will have to travel between black holes to be able to return...
